comment.author: 95731483@N02
comment._content: This is an F-6C reconnaissance version of the P-51C serving with the 118th TRS, 23rd FG in Kweilin, China, September 1944. The first black lightning markings of the squadron's airplanes would not appear until October 1944 after the squadron had evacuated Kweilin for their rear base area at Chengkung>
